page.title: 11A DAY ON THE FARM
page.content: My name is Rhiannon,I am nine years old and I live in Warton.I work at Ivy House Farm after school,at weekends and in my holidays.I wake up at 6.30am and{farming}clothes.I make myself some breakfast which is usually a cup of coffee and a sandwich.I put on my wellies and go to the fields with the{ {farmer}to fetch the cows for milking. We bring them to the collecting yard. When milking is finished we measure some milk out for the calves, then I go home for the rest of my breakfast. I go back to the farm again in the afternoon and I leave the cows in the milking parlour and I go to feed the heifers.At other times during the year I help with the{harvest}and in the winter when the cattle are in the barn we feed them silage.I enjoy working on the farm because I love the{country} and animals.
